org.giddap.dreamfactory.leetcode.onlinejudge
Interface BestTimeToBuyAndSellStockIII

All Known Implementing Classes:
BestTimeToBuyAndSellStockIIIOn2Impl, BestTimeToBuyAndSellStockIIITwoPassOofNImpl
public interface BestTimeToBuyAndSellStockIII

Best Time To Buy And Sell Stock III

Say you have an array for which the ith element is the price of a given stock on day i.

Design an algorithm to find the maximum profit. You may complete at most two transactions.

Note: You may not engage in multiple transactions at the same time (ie, you must sell the stock before you buy again).

Links: http://blog.unieagle.net/2012/12/05/leetcode%E9%A2%98%E7%9B%AE%EF%BC%9Abest-time-to-buy-and-sell-stock-iii%EF%BC%8C%E4%B8%80%E7%BB%B4%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%E8%A7%84%E5%88%92/ http://n00tc0d3r.blogspot.com/2013/01/best-time-to-buy-and-sell-stock.html
